oops saw ff after ;) ff should be installed by default with Ubuntu.  There are ppa's for later versions but really do not recommend them - you should stay with the default install.
Should be under: Applications > Internet > Firefox
be warned if you install the ppa it could break on a bad update and you'll have to wait for the next update to hopefully fix it.
